HomePage.description: The home page of the BrowserStack Demo e-commerce website, displaying a catalog of phones.

elements.name: BrowserStack Logo
elements.description: Link to the home page.

elements.name: Search Input
elements.description: Input field for searching products.

elements.name: Search Button
elements.description: Button to initiate the search.

elements.name: Sign In
elements.description: Link to the sign-in page.

elements.name: Cart
elements.description: Button to view the shopping cart.

elements.name: Apple Filter
elements.description: Filter products by Apple vendor.

elements.name: Samsung Filter
elements.description: Filter products by Samsung vendor.

elements.name: Google Filter
elements.description: Filter products by Google vendor.

elements.name: OnePlus Filter
elements.description: Filter products by OnePlus vendor.

elements.name: Order By Select
elements.description: Dropdown to select the order of products.

elements.name: Add to cart
elements.description: Button to add the product to the cart.

assertions: Page contains the text 'Shop smarter with our mobile e-commerce platform!'
At least one product is displayed on the page.

UnknownPage.description: This is the main product listing page of the BrowserStack Demo website, displaying available products and allowing users to add them to their cart. The screenshot also shows the shopping cart modal.

elements.name: Apple Filter
elements.description: Button to filter products by Apple.

elements.name: Samsung Filter
elements.description: Button to filter products by Samsung.

elements.name: Google Filter
elements.description: Button to filter products by Google.

elements.name: OnePlus Filter
elements.description: Button to filter products by OnePlus.

elements.name: Add to cart (iPhone 12)
elements.description: Button to add the iPhone 12 to the cart.

elements.name: Add to cart (iPhone 12 Mini)
elements.description: Button to add the iPhone 12 Mini to the cart.

elements.name: Bag Icon
elements.description: Icon to open the shopping cart.

elements.name: Checkout Button
elements.description: Button to proceed to checkout.

elements.name: Remove Item from Cart
elements.description: Button to remove an item from the cart.

assertions: Page contains the text 'Shop smarter with our mobile e-commerce platform!'
At least one product is displayed on the page
